title: Create Effect
descriptionText: Create a new effect that can be applied to players and other characters.
name: Name
namePlaceholder: Enter the name of the effect
descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a short description of the effect
durationPlaceholder: Enter the duration of the effect (in seconds)
typeTooltip: Negative buffs can cause damage, positive buffs cannot.
durationUnitTooltip: The time unit is in minutes
valueTooltip: For positive effects, the value is added to health, for negative effects it is subtracted. If Duration Type=Rounds, the value is applied per round, otherwise once.

name.minLength: The effect name must be at least 2 characters.
